Html: Hi im from brazil.. Im a new in DD3..   i had add reference to dll silverlight last update (download spring 2010).. but I dont found candlestick sample .. is only for wpf this sample???? how i can get it?

Unzip the nightly build and follow the path: /src/DynamicDataDisplay.Samples/Demos/v04/StockMarkersPage.

v02 also has a related samples.
